content:
Golf and Stay Package

Looking for a great way to play a Championship Golf caliber course and expierence everything Split Rock has to offer?

Look no further than our Golf and Stay Package. Our package includes accomodations in one of our many hotel rooms, breakfast at the Split Rock Grill, Dinner at Sunset Green, Split Rock Grill or Lake View Tavern, 18 Holes of golf at the Split Rock Country Club with cart and a bucket of range balls per person per night stayed.

VIEW MORE DETAILS
